Text: A note of thanksMr Skilling Hello My name is Tim Ng and I was a summer analyst the last summers Last August I met with you for a few minutes in your office to talk and ask for advice You told me to diversify my life experiences as that can only help you throughout life Like you with your desire to fly planes I decided to take a plane to travel around the world In the last year I studied abroad in Hong Kong traveled to places such as China Macau Thailand and Australia After travelling I see how doing different things seeing different things can only enhance your total life experience Tomorrow I will return to Enron as a fulltime Analyst I look forward to this opportunity to learn more and challenge myself and hopefully do new and different things to diversify my experiences I thank you for taking the time to meet with me last summer It really meant a lot to me and your advice has really changed the way I go about things in life now Perhaps one day I can meet with you again I know that your schedule can only be busier now but hopefully I can see you during your talk with the new Analysts sometime in the next week or so Take care and I hope to hear from you soon Kindest regards Tim Ng
